title: Movie Review Sentiment Analysis EDA and models
description: General informationIn this kernel I'll work with data from Movie Review Sentiment Analysis Playground Competition. This dataset is interesting for NLP researching. Sentences from original dataset were split in separate phrases and each of them has a sentiment label. Also a lot of phrases are really short which makes classifying them quite challenging. Let's try!
